submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        pre = [0]*(k+5)
        pre[0] = n>>1
        for i in range(n>>1):
            num1, num2 = nums[i], nums[-i-1]
            diff = abs(num1 - num2)
            mx = max(num1, num2, k - num1, k - num2)
            pre[mx+1] += 1
            pre[diff] -= 1
            pre[diff+1] += 1
        cur = 0
        res = n
        for i in range(k+1):
            cur += pre[i]
            res = min(res, cur)
        return res
